p: Among HIV-positive MSM/TG, 75.6% had last attended HIV care at public clinics and 18.1% at MSM-specific clinics, with the remaining at private clinics. There were 89.3% (n = 63/90) who were satisfied with their last clinicâ€™s privacy and 91.5% (n = 65/70) who were satisfied with the respect they were shown; these figures were 100% among those visiting MSM-specific clinics.
